title: Episode 162: The Church of the Subgenius
description:
Two friends in Dallas joined up to make jokes together. They put their message out in the world and soon found themselves with followers around the world. What started as an elaborate series of increasingly bizarre beliefs made up by this pair soon turned into something more sinister.
